   161â†’    mkdir -p "$RESOURCE_BACKUP_DIR"
   162â†’    rsync -a "$RESOURCES_DIR/" "$RESOURCE_BACKUP_DIR"/ >/dev/null 2>&1
   163â†’
   164â†’    local stage_parent
   165â†’    stage_parent="$(mktemp -d)"
   166â†’    local stage_dir="$stage_parent/resources"
   167â†’    mkdir -p "$stage_dir"
   168â†’    rsync -a "$RESOURCE_BACKUP_DIR"/ "$stage_dir"/ >/dev/null 2>&1
   169â†’
   170â†’    # ä»…ä¿ç•™ macOS æ‰€éœ€äºŒè¿›åˆ¶
   171â†’    if [[ -d "$stage_dir/bin/windows" ]]; then
   172â†’        rm -rf "$stage_dir/bin/windows"
   173â†’    fi
   174â†’
   175â†’    rm -rf "$RESOURCES_DIR"
   176â†’    mv "$stage_dir" "$RESOURCES_DIR"
   177â†’    rm -rf "$stage_parent"
   178â†’}
   179â†’
   180â†’restore_platform_resources() {
   181â†’    if [[ -n "$RESOURCE_BACKUP_DIR" && -d "$RESOURCE_BACKUP_DIR" ]]; then
   182â†’        local backup_parent
   183â†’        backup_parent="$(dirname "$RESOURCE_BACKUP_DIR")"
   184â†’        rm -rf "$RESOURCES_DIR"
   185â†’        mv "$RESOURCE_BACKUP_DIR" "$RESOURCES_DIR"
   186â†’        rm -rf "$backup_parent" 2>/dev/null || true
   187â†’        RESOURCE_BACKUP_DIR=""
   188â†’    fi
   189â†’}
   190â†’
   191â†’cleanup_on_exit() {
   192â†’    if [[ -f "$CONFIG_BACKUP" ]]; then
   193â†’        mv "$CONFIG_BACKUP" "$PROJECT_ROOT/config_api.py"
   194â†’        echo "ğŸ” å·²æ¢å¤ config_api.py"
   195â†’    fi
   196â†’    restore_platform_resources
   197â†’    rm -rf "$TEMP_ICON_DIR" 2>/dev/null || true
   198â†’}
   199â†’
   200â†’generate_app_icon() {
   201â†’    local source_png="$ICON_SOURCE_PNG"
   202â†’    if [[ ! -f "$source_png" ]]; then
   203â†’        echo "âŒ æ‰¾ä¸åˆ°å›¾æ ‡æºæ–‡ä»¶: $source_png"
   204â†’        exit 1
   205â†’    fi
   206â†’
   207â†’    if ! python3 -m icnsutil --version >/dev/null 2>&1; then
   208â†’        echo "âŒ æœªå®‰è£… icnsutilï¼Œè¯·å…ˆæ‰§è¡Œ: python3 -m pip install icnsutil"
   209â†’        exit 1
   210â†’    fi
   211â†’
   212â†’    TEMP_ICON_DIR="$(mktemp -d)"
   213â†’    local iconset_dir="$TEMP_ICON_DIR/Iconset"
   214â†’    mkdir -p "$iconset_dir"
   215â†’
   216â†’    declare -a base_sizes=(16 32 128 256 512)
   217â†’    local -a compose_args=()
   218â†’    for size in "${base_sizes[@]}"; do
   219â†’        local base_file="$iconset_dir/icon_${size}x${size}.png"
   220â†’        sips -z "$size" "$size" "$source_png" --out "$base_file" >/dev/null
   221â†’        compose_args+=("$base_file")
   222â†’
   223â†’        local retina=$((size * 2))
   224â†’        local retina_file="$iconset_dir/icon_${size}x${size}@2x.png"
   225â†’        sips -z "$retina" "$retina" "$source_png" --out "$retina_file" >/dev/null
   226â†’        compose_args+=("$retina_file")
   227â†’    done
   228â†’
   229â†’    if ! python3 -m icnsutil compose -f "$ICON_TARGET" "${compose_args[@]}"; then
   230â†’        echo "âŒ icnsutil ç”Ÿæˆå›¾æ ‡å¤±è´¥: $ICON_TARGET"
   231â†’        exit 1
   232â†’    fi
   233â†’
   234â†’    echo "âœ… å·²ç”Ÿæˆ macOS å›¾æ ‡: $ICON_TARGET"
   235â†’}
   236â†’
   237â†’build_app() {
   238â†’    echo "ğŸ”¨ å¼€å§‹æ„å»º ${EDITION_LABEL} ..."
   239â†’    cd "$PROJECT_ROOT"
   240â†’
   241â†’    export GEMENG_APP_EDITION="$EDITION"
   242â†’    export GEMENG_APP_NAME="$APP_NAME"
   243â†’    export GEMENG_APP_VERSION="$APP_VERSION"
   244â†’    export GEMENG_APP_BUNDLE_ID="$BUNDLE_ID"
   245â†’    export GEMENG_APP_ICON="$ICON_TARGET"
   246â†’    export ARCHFLAGS="-arch arm64"
   247â†’    export MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET="${MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET:-13.0}"
   248â†’
   249â†’    local python_bin="${PYTHON_BIN:-python3}"
   250â†’    local build_status=0
   251â†’    if [[ "$(uname -m)" == "arm64" ]]; then
   252â†’        set +e
   253â†’        arch -arm64 "$python_bin" "$PACKAGING_DIR/setup.py" py2app
   254â†’        build_status=$?
   255â†’        set -e
   256â†’    else
   257â†’        "$python_bin" "$PACKAGING_DIR/setup.py" py2app || build_status=$?
   258â†’    fi
   259â†’    if [[ $build_status -ne 0 ]]; then
   260â†’        echo "âš ï¸ py2app è¿”å›çŠ¶æ€ $build_statusï¼Œç»§ç»­æ‰§è¡Œï¼ˆæ—¥å¿—è§ä¸Šï¼‰"
   261â†’    fi
   262â†’
   263â†’    local built_app="$DIST_DIR/$APP_NAME.app"
   264â†’    if [[ ! -d "$built_app" ]]; then
   265â†’        echo "âŒ æœªæ‰¾åˆ°æ„å»ºäº§ç‰©: $built_app"
   266â†’        exit 1
   267â†’    fi
   268â†’
   269â†’    rm -rf "$FINAL_APP_PATH"
   270â†’    mv "$built_app" "$FINAL_APP_PATH"
   271â†’    echo "âœ… åº”ç”¨æ„å»ºæˆåŠŸ: $FINAL_APP_PATH"
   272â†’}
   273â†’
   274â†’fix_app_permissions() {
   275â†’    echo "ğŸ”§ ä¿®å¤æƒé™..."
   276â†’    find "$FINAL_APP_PATH" -type f -name "*.so" -exec chmod +x {} \;
   277â†’    find "$FINAL_APP_PATH" -type f -name "*.dylib" -exec chmod +x {} \;
   278â†’    local binary="$FINAL_APP_PATH/Contents/MacOS/$APP_NAME"
   279â†’    if [[ -f "$binary" ]]; then
   280â†’        chmod +x "$binary"
   281â†’    fi
   282â†’    echo "âœ… æƒé™ä¿®å¤å®Œæˆ"
   283â†’}
   284â†’
   285â†’verify_app() {
   286â†’    echo "ğŸ” éªŒè¯åº”ç”¨ç»“æ„..."
   287â†’    if [[ ! -f "$FINAL_APP_PATH/Contents/Info.plist" ]]; then
   288â†’        echo "âŒ ç¼ºå°‘ Info.plist"
   289â†’        exit 1
   290â†’    fi
   291â†’    if [[ ! -f "$FINAL_APP_PATH/Contents/MacOS/$APP_NAME" ]]; then
   292â†’        echo "âŒ ç¼ºå°‘ä¸»æ‰§è¡Œæ–‡ä»¶"
   293â†’        exit 1
   294â†’    fi
   295â†’    echo "âœ… ç»“æ„éªŒè¯é€šè¿‡"
   296â†’}
   297â†’
   298â†’thin_binary() {
   299â†’    local binary="$FINAL_APP_PATH/Contents/MacOS/$APP_NAME"
   300â†’    if [[ -f "$binary" ]]; then
   301â†’        local archs
   302â†’        archs="$(lipo -info "$binary" 2>/dev/null || true)"
   303â†’        echo "â„¹ï¸ å½“å‰å¯æ‰§è¡Œæ¶æ„: $archs"
   304â†’        echo "[$(date '+%F %T')] $APP_PACKAGE_NAME -> $archs" >> "$PROJECT_ROOT/thin_binary.log"
   305â†’        if [[ "$archs" == *"Non-fat"* ]]; then
   306â†’            echo "âœ… å¯æ‰§è¡Œæ–‡ä»¶å·²æ˜¯å•æ¶æ„: $archs"
   307â†’            return
   308â†’        fi
   309â†’        if [[ "$archs" == *"arm64"* ]]; then
   310â†’            echo "â†”ï¸ å»é™¤å¤šä½™æ¶æ„: $archs"
   311â†’            lipo "$binary" -thin arm64 -output "${binary}.arm64"
   312â†’            mv "${binary}.arm64" "$binary"
   313â†’        fi
   314â†’    fi
   315â†’}
   316â†’
   317â†’embed_python_runtime() {
   318â†’    local python_bin="${PYTHON_BIN:-python3}"
   319â†’    local framework_dir
   320â†’    framework_dir="$("$python_bin" -c 'import os, sysconfig; prefix=sysconfig.get_config_var("PYTHONFRAMEWORKPREFIX"); name=sysconfig.get_config_var("PYTHONFRAMEWORK"); print(os.path.join(prefix, name + ".framework") if prefix and name else "")' 2>/dev/null)"
   321â†’
   322â†’    if [[ -z "$framework_dir" || ! -d "$framework_dir" ]]; then
   323â†’        echo "âš ï¸ æœªæ‰¾åˆ°å¯ç”¨çš„ Python.frameworkï¼Œè·³è¿‡åµŒå…¥"
   324â†’        return
   325â†’    fi
   326â†’
   327â†’    local framework_name
   328â†’    framework_name="$(basename "$framework_dir")"
   329â†’    local target_dir="$FINAL_APP_PATH/Contents/Frameworks/$framework_name"
   330â†’
   331â†’    mkdir -p "$FINAL_APP_PATH/Contents/Frameworks"
   332â†’    rm -rf "$target_dir"
   333â†’    rsync -a "$framework_dir/" "$target_dir/" >/dev/null 2>&1
   334â†’    echo "âœ… å·²åµŒå…¥ Python æ¡†æ¶: $framework_name"
   335â†’}
   336â†’
   337â†’clean_app_metadata() {
   338â†’    echo "ğŸ§½ æ¸…ç†æ‰©å±•å±æ€§..."
   339â†’    find "$FINAL_APP_PATH" -name '.DS_Store' -delete 2>/dev/null || true
   340â†’    find "$FINAL_APP_PATH" -name '._*' -delete 2>/dev/null || true
   341â†’    xattr -cr "$FINAL_APP_PATH"
   342â†’}
   343â†’
   344â†’sign_app() {
   345â†’    echo "âœï¸ æ‰§è¡Œ ad-hoc ç­¾å..."
   346â†’    clean_app_metadata
   347â†’    if ! codesign --force --deep --options runtime --sign - "$FINAL_APP_PATH"; then
   348â†’        echo "âŒ codesign å¤±è´¥"
   349â†’        exit 1
   350â†’    fi
   351â†’    if ! codesign -vv "$FINAL_APP_PATH" >/dev/null 2>&1; then
   352â†’        echo "âŒ ç­¾åæ ¡éªŒå¤±è´¥"
   353â†’        exit 1
   354â†’    fi
   355â†’    if ! spctl --assess -vv --type execute "$FINAL_APP_PATH" >/dev/null 2>&1; then
   356â†’        echo "â„¹ï¸ Gatekeeper ä»éœ€å³é”®â†’æ‰“å¼€æˆ–æ‰§è¡Œ 'sudo spctl --add \"$FINAL_APP_PATH\"' åå†è¿è¡Œï¼ˆæ­£å¸¸æç¤ºï¼‰"
   357â†’    fi
   358â†’    echo "âœ… ç­¾åä¸å±æ€§ä¿®å¤å®Œæˆ"
   359â†’}
   360â†’
   361â†’package_release() {
   362â†’    mkdir -p "$RELEASE_DIR"
   363â†’    local release_app="$RELEASE_DIR/${APP_PACKAGE_NAME}.app"
   364â†’    local release_zip="$RELEASE_DIR/${APP_PACKAGE_NAME}.app.zip"
   365â†’
   366â†’    rm -rf "$release_app" "$release_zip"
   367â†’    cp -R "$FINAL_APP_PATH" "$release_app"
   368â†’    (cd "$RELEASE_DIR" && ditto -c -k --keepParent "${APP_PACKAGE_NAME}.app" "${APP_PACKAGE_NAME}.app.zip")
   369â†’    echo "âœ… äº§ç‰©å·²è¾“å‡ºè‡³: $release_app"
   370â†’    echo "âœ… å‹ç¼©åŒ…: $release_zip"
   371â†’}
   372â†’
   373â†’create_dmg() {
   374â†’    echo "ğŸ“¦ åˆ›å»º DMG..."
   375â†’    mkdir -p "$DMG_DIR"
   376â†’    rm -rf "$DMG_DIR"/*
   377â†’    cp -R "$FINAL_APP_PATH" "$DMG_DIR/"
   378â†’    ln -sf /Applications "$DMG_DIR/Applications"
   379â†’
   380â†’    local dmg_path="$DIST_DIR/${APP_PACKAGE_NAME}.dmg"
   381â†’    rm -f "$dmg_path"
   382â†’
   383â†’    hdiutil create -volname "$APP_PACKAGE_NAME" \
   384â†’        -srcfolder "$DMG_DIR" \
   385â†’        -ov -format UDZO \
   386â†’        "$dmg_path" >/dev/null
   387â†’
   388â†’    echo "âœ… DMG åˆ›å»ºå®Œæˆ: $dmg_path"
   389â†’}
   390â†’
   391â†’main() {
   392â†’    if $CLEAN_ONLY; then
   393â†’        clean_build
   394â†’        exit 0
   395â†’    fi
   396â†’
   397â†’    check_requirements
   398â†’    install_dependencies
   399â†’
   400â†’    # å›¾æ ‡å¤„ç†ï¼šæ­£å¼ç‰ˆç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨ç°æœ‰ icnsï¼Œä½“éªŒç‰ˆä» PNG ç”Ÿæˆ
   401â†’    if [[ "$EDITION" == "official" ]]; then
   402â†’        echo "âœ… ä½¿ç”¨ç°æœ‰é«˜æ¸…å›¾æ ‡: app_icon.icns (674K)"
   403â†’        # æ— éœ€ç”Ÿæˆï¼ŒICON_TARGET å·²æŒ‡å‘ç°æœ‰æ–‡ä»¶
   404â†’    elif [[ "$EDITION" == "trial" ]]; then
   405â†’        generate_app_icon
   406â†’    fi
   407â†’
   408â†’    clean_build
   409â†’    prepare_config
   410â†’    prepare_platform_resources
   411â†’    trap cleanup_on_exit EXIT
   412â†’
   413â†’    build_app
   414â†’    fix_app_permissions
   415â†’    verify_app
   416â†’    thin_binary
   417â†’    embed_python_runtime
   418â†’    sign_app
   419â†’    package_release
   420â†’
   421â†’    if $CREATE_DMG_FLAG; then
   422â†’        create_dmg
   423â†’    fi
   424â†’
   425â†’    echo ""
   426â†’    echo "ğŸ‰ ${EDITION_LABEL} æ‰“åŒ…å®Œæˆ"
   427â†’    echo "   åº”ç”¨: $FINAL_APP_PATH"
   428â†’    if $CREATE_DMG_FLAG; then
   429â†’        echo "   DMG : $DIST_DIR/${APP_PACKAGE_NAME}.dmg"
   430â†’    fi
   431â†’    echo "ğŸ‘‰ æ³¨æ„ï¼šå½“å‰æ„å»ºä»…é’ˆå¯¹ Apple Silicon (arm64) è¿›è¡ŒéªŒè¯ã€‚"
   432â†’}
   433â†’
   434â†’main "$@"
   435â†’

#!/bin/bash
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
# é¸½æ¢¦AI - macOS æ‰“åŒ…è„šæœ¬ï¼ˆæ”¯æŒæ­£å¼ç‰ˆ / ä½“éªŒç‰ˆï¼‰

set -euo pipefail

APP_NAME="é¸½æ¢¦Godream"

SCRIPT_DIR="$(cd "$(dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}")" && pwd)"
PROJECT_ROOT="$(cd "$SCRIPT_DIR/../.." && pwd)"
PACKAGING_DIR="$SCRIPT_DIR"
BUILD_DIR="$PROJECT_ROOT/build"
DIST_DIR="$PROJECT_ROOT/dist"
DMG_DIR="$PROJECT_ROOT/dmg_build"
RESOURCES_DIR="$PROJECT_ROOT/edition/resources"
RESOURCE_BACKUP_DIR=""
TEMP_ICON_DIR=""

detect_version() {
    python3 -c "import runpy, pathlib; version_path=pathlib.Path(r'''$PROJECT_ROOT''')/'version.py'; data=runpy.run_path(str(version_path)) if version_path.exists() else {}; print(data.get('__version__','0.0.0'))"
}

APP_VERSION="$(detect_version)"

usage() {
    cat <<EOF
ç”¨æ³•: $0 [é€‰é¡¹]
é€‰é¡¹:
  --edition <official|trial>  æŒ‡å®šæ‰“åŒ…ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼ˆé»˜è®¤ officialï¼‰
  --clean-only               ä»…æ¸…ç†æ„å»ºç›®å½•åé€€å‡º
  --no-dmg                   ä¸ç”Ÿæˆ DMG å®‰è£…åŒ…
  --help                     æ˜¾ç¤ºæœ¬å¸®åŠ©
EOF
}

EDITION="official"
CREATE_DMG_FLAG=true
CLEAN_ONLY=false

while [[ $# -gt 0 ]]; do
    case "$1" in
        --edition)
            EDITION="${2:-official}"
            shift 2
            ;;
        --clean-only)
            CLEAN_ONLY=true
            shift
            ;;
        --no-dmg)
            CREATE_DMG_FLAG=false
            shift
            ;;
        --help)
            usage
            exit 0
            ;;
        *)
            echo "æœªçŸ¥é€‰é¡¹: $1"
            usage
            exit 1
            ;;
    esac
done

case "$EDITION" in
    official)
        EDITION_LABEL="æ­£å¼ç‰ˆ"
        CONFIG_SOURCE="$PROJECT_ROOT/config_api_production.py"
        # ç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨ç°æœ‰é«˜æ¸… icns å›¾æ ‡ï¼ˆ674Kï¼Œå¤šå°ºå¯¸ï¼‰
        ICON_TARGET="$PACKAGING_DIR/app_icon.icns"
        BUNDLE_ID="com.gemeng.ai"
        ;;
    trial)
        EDITION_LABEL="ä½“éªŒç‰ˆ"
        CONFIG_SOURCE="$PROJECT_ROOT/config_api_trial.py"
        ICON_SOURCE_PNG="$PROJECT_ROOT/Godreamå›¾æ ‡ï¼ˆTç‰ˆï¼‰.png"
        ICON_FALLBACK_ICNS="$PACKAGING_DIR/godream_trial.icns"
        BUNDLE_ID="com.gemeng.ai.trial"
        ;;
    *)
        echo "âš ï¸ æœªçŸ¥çš„ç‰ˆæœ¬ç±»å‹: $EDITION"
        exit 1
        ;;
esac

APP_PACKAGE_NAME="${APP_NAME}_v${APP_VERSION}_${EDITION_LABEL}"
FINAL_APP_PATH="$DIST_DIR/${APP_PACKAGE_NAME}.app"
RELEASE_DIR="$PROJECT_ROOT/release/macos/$EDITION"
CONFIG_BACKUP="$PROJECT_ROOT/config_api.py.backup_for_macos_packaging"
ICON_TARGET="$PACKAGING_DIR/app_icon.icns"

ensure_command() {
    if ! command -v "$1" >/dev/null 2>&1; then
        echo "âŒ æœªæ‰¾åˆ°å‘½ä»¤: $1"
        exit 1
    fi
}

check_requirements() {
    echo "ğŸ” æ£€æŸ¥ç¯å¢ƒ..."
    if [[ "$OSTYPE" != "darwin"* ]]; then
        echo "âŒ æ­¤è„šæœ¬ä»…æ”¯æŒåœ¨ macOS ä¸Šè¿è¡Œ"
        exit 1
    fi
    ensure_command python3
    ensure_command pip3
    ensure_command sips
    ensure_command iconutil
    ensure_command rsync

    if [[ "$(uname -m)" != "arm64" ]]; then
        echo "âš ï¸ å½“å‰è„šæœ¬ä»…éªŒè¯è¿‡ Apple Silicon (arm64) å¹³å°ï¼ŒIntel è®¾å¤‡å¯èƒ½å‡ºç°å…¼å®¹æ€§é—®é¢˜ã€‚"
    fi
    echo "âœ… ç¯å¢ƒæ£€æŸ¥é€šè¿‡"
}

install_dependencies() {
    if [[ "${SKIP_PIP_INSTALL:-0}" == "1" ]]; then
        echo "âš ï¸ è·³è¿‡ä¾èµ–å®‰è£…ï¼ˆæ£€æµ‹åˆ° SKIP_PIP_INSTALL=1ï¼‰"
        return
    fi

    echo "ğŸ“¦ å®‰è£…æ‰“åŒ…ä¾èµ–..."
    cd "$PROJECT_ROOT"
    pip3 install --upgrade py2app dmgbuild >/dev/null

    if [[ -f "requirements_py313.txt" ]]; then
        pip3 install -r requirements_py313.txt >/dev/null
    elif [[ -f "requirements.txt" ]]; then
        pip3 install -r requirements.txt >/dev/null
    fi

    pip3 install pillow PyQt5 >/dev/null
    echo "âœ… ä¾èµ–å®‰è£…å®Œæˆ"
}

clean_build() {
    echo "ğŸ§¹ æ¸…ç†æ„å»ºç›®å½•..."
    rm -rf "$BUILD_DIR" "$DIST_DIR" "$DMG_DIR"
    echo "âœ… æ¸…ç†å®Œæˆ"
}

prepare_config() {
    if [[ ! -f "$CONFIG_SOURCE" ]]; then
        echo "âŒ æ‰¾ä¸åˆ°é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶: $CONFIG_SOURCE"
        exit 1
    fi
    cp "$PROJECT_ROOT/config_api.py" "$CONFIG_BACKUP" 2>/dev/null || true
    cp "$CONFIG_SOURCE" "$PROJECT_ROOT/config_api.py"
    echo "âœ… å·²åˆ‡æ¢é…ç½®åˆ°: $(basename "$CONFIG_SOURCE")"
}

prepare_platform_resources() {
    if [[ ! -d "$RESOURCES_DIR" ]]; then
        return
    fi
    local backup_parent
    backup_parent="$(mktemp -d)"
    RESOURCE_BACKUP_DIR="$backup_parent/resources_backup"
    mkdir -p "$RESOURCE_BACKUP_DIR"
    rsync -a "$RESOURCES_DIR/" "$RESOURCE_BACKUP_DIR"/ >/dev/null 2>&1

    local stage_parent
    stage_parent="$(mktemp -d)"
    local stage_dir="$stage_parent/resources"
    mkdir -p "$stage_dir"
    rsync -a "$RESOURCE_BACKUP_DIR"/ "$stage_dir"/ >/dev/null 2>&1

    # ä»…ä¿ç•™ macOS æ‰€éœ€äºŒè¿›åˆ¶
    if [[ -d "$stage_dir/bin/windows" ]]; then
        rm -rf "$stage_dir/bin/windows"
    fi

    rm -rf "$RESOURCES_DIR"
    mv "$stage_dir" "$RESOURCES_DIR"
    rm -rf "$stage_parent"
}

restore_platform_resources() {
    if [[ -n "$RESOURCE_BACKUP_DIR" && -d "$RESOURCE_BACKUP_DIR" ]]; then
        local backup_parent
        backup_parent="$(dirname "$RESOURCE_BACKUP_DIR")"
        rm -rf "$RESOURCES_DIR"
        mv "$RESOURCE_BACKUP_DIR" "$RESOURCES_DIR"
        rm -rf "$backup_parent" 2>/dev/null || true
        RESOURCE_BACKUP_DIR=""
    fi
}

cleanup_on_exit() {
    if [[ -f "$CONFIG_BACKUP" ]]; then
        mv "$CONFIG_BACKUP" "$PROJECT_ROOT/config_api.py"
        echo "ğŸ” å·²æ¢å¤ config_api.py"
    fi
    restore_platform_resources
    rm -rf "$TEMP_ICON_DIR" 2>/dev/null || true
}

generate_app_icon() {
    local source_png="$ICON_SOURCE_PNG"
    if [[ ! -f "$source_png" ]]; then
        echo "âŒ æ‰¾ä¸åˆ°å›¾æ ‡æºæ–‡ä»¶: $source_png"
        exit 1
    fi

    if ! python3 -m icnsutil --version >/dev/null 2>&1; then
        echo "âŒ æœªå®‰è£… icnsutilï¼Œè¯·å…ˆæ‰§è¡Œ: python3 -m pip install icnsutil"
        exit 1
    fi

    TEMP_ICON_DIR="$(mktemp -d)"
    local iconset_dir="$TEMP_ICON_DIR/Iconset"
    mkdir -p "$iconset_dir"

    declare -a base_sizes=(16 32 128 256 512)
    local -a compose_args=()
    for size in "${base_sizes[@]}"; do
        local base_file="$iconset_dir/icon_${size}x${size}.png"
        sips -z "$size" "$size" "$source_png" --out "$base_file" >/dev/null
        compose_args+=("$base_file")

        local retina=$((size * 2))
        local retina_file="$iconset_dir/icon_${size}x${size}@2x.png"
        sips -z "$retina" "$retina" "$source_png" --out "$retina_file" >/dev/null
        compose_args+=("$retina_file")
    done

    if ! python3 -m icnsutil compose -f "$ICON_TARGET" "${compose_args[@]}"; then
        echo "âŒ icnsutil ç”Ÿæˆå›¾æ ‡å¤±è´¥: $ICON_TARGET"
        exit 1
    fi

    echo "âœ… å·²ç”Ÿæˆ macOS å›¾æ ‡: $ICON_TARGET"
}

build_app() {
    echo "ğŸ”¨ å¼€å§‹æ„å»º ${EDITION_LABEL} ..."
    cd "$PROJECT_ROOT"

    export GEMENG_APP_EDITION="$EDITION"
    export GEMENG_APP_NAME="$APP_NAME"
    export GEMENG_APP_VERSION="$APP_VERSION"
    export GEMENG_APP_BUNDLE_ID="$BUNDLE_ID"
    export GEMENG_APP_ICON="$ICON_TARGET"
    export ARCHFLAGS="-arch arm64"
    export MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET="${MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET:-13.0}"

    local python_bin="${PYTHON_BIN:-python3}"
    local build_status=0
    if [[ "$(uname -m)" == "arm64" ]]; then
        set +e
        arch -arm64 "$python_bin" "$PACKAGING_DIR/setup.py" py2app
        build_status=$?
        set -e
    else
        "$python_bin" "$PACKAGING_DIR/setup.py" py2app || build_status=$?
    fi
    if [[ $build_status -ne 0 ]]; then
        echo "âš ï¸ py2app è¿”å›çŠ¶æ€ $build_statusï¼Œç»§ç»­æ‰§è¡Œï¼ˆæ—¥å¿—è§ä¸Šï¼‰"
    fi

    local built_app="$DIST_DIR/$APP_NAME.app"
    if [[ ! -d "$built_app" ]]; then
        echo "âŒ æœªæ‰¾åˆ°æ„å»ºäº§ç‰©: $built_app"
        exit 1
    fi

    rm -rf "$FINAL_APP_PATH"
    mv "$built_app" "$FINAL_APP_PATH"
    echo "âœ… åº”ç”¨æ„å»ºæˆåŠŸ: $FINAL_APP_PATH"
}

fix_app_permissions() {
    echo "ğŸ”§ ä¿®å¤æƒé™..."
    find "$FINAL_APP_PATH" -type f -name "*.so" -exec chmod +x {} \;
    find "$FINAL_APP_PATH" -type f -name "*.dylib" -exec chmod +x {} \;
    local binary="$FINAL_APP_PATH/Contents/MacOS/$APP_NAME"
    if [[ -f "$binary" ]]; then
        chmod +x "$binary"
    fi
    echo "âœ… æƒé™ä¿®å¤å®Œæˆ"
}

verify_app() {
    echo "ğŸ” éªŒè¯åº”ç”¨ç»“æ„..."
    if [[ ! -f "$FINAL_APP_PATH/Contents/Info.plist" ]]; then
        echo "âŒ ç¼ºå°‘ Info.plist"
        exit 1
    fi
    if [[ ! -f "$FINAL_APP_PATH/Contents/MacOS/$APP_NAME" ]]; then
        echo "âŒ ç¼ºå°‘ä¸»æ‰§è¡Œæ–‡ä»¶"
        exit 1
    fi
    echo "âœ… ç»“æ„éªŒè¯é€šè¿‡"
}

thin_binary() {
    local binary="$FINAL_APP_PATH/Contents/MacOS/$APP_NAME"
    if [[ -f "$binary" ]]; then
        local archs
        archs="$(lipo -info "$binary" 2>/dev/null || true)"
        echo "â„¹ï¸ å½“å‰å¯æ‰§è¡Œæ¶æ„: $archs"
        echo "[$(date '+%F %T')] $APP_PACKAGE_NAME -> $archs" >> "$PROJECT_ROOT/thin_binary.log"
        if [[ "$archs" == *"Non-fat"* ]]; then
            echo "âœ… å¯æ‰§è¡Œæ–‡ä»¶å·²æ˜¯å•æ¶æ„: $archs"
            return
        fi
        if [[ "$archs" == *"arm64"* ]]; then
            echo "â†”ï¸ å»é™¤å¤šä½™æ¶æ„: $archs"
            lipo "$binary" -thin arm64 -output "${binary}.arm64"
            mv "${binary}.arm64" "$binary"
        fi
    fi
}

embed_python_runtime() {
    local python_bin="${PYTHON_BIN:-python3}"
    local framework_dir
    framework_dir="$("$python_bin" -c 'import os, sysconfig; prefix=sysconfig.get_config_var("PYTHONFRAMEWORKPREFIX"); name=sysconfig.get_config_var("PYTHONFRAMEWORK"); print(os.path.join(prefix, name + ".framework") if prefix and name else "")' 2>/dev/null)"

    if [[ -z "$framework_dir" || ! -d "$framework_dir" ]]; then
        echo "âš ï¸ æœªæ‰¾åˆ°å¯ç”¨çš„ Python.frameworkï¼Œè·³è¿‡åµŒå…¥"
        return
    fi

    local framework_name
    framework_name="$(basename "$framework_dir")"
    local target_dir="$FINAL_APP_PATH/Contents/Frameworks/$framework_name"

    mkdir -p "$FINAL_APP_PATH/Contents/Frameworks"
    rm -rf "$target_dir"
    rsync -a "$framework_dir/" "$target_dir/" >/dev/null 2>&1
    echo "âœ… å·²åµŒå…¥ Python æ¡†æ¶: $framework_name"
}

clean_app_metadata() {
    echo "ğŸ§½ æ¸…ç†æ‰©å±•å±æ€§..."
    find "$FINAL_APP_PATH" -name '.DS_Store' -delete 2>/dev/null || true
    find "$FINAL_APP_PATH" -name '._*' -delete 2>/dev/null || true
    xattr -cr "$FINAL_APP_PATH"
}

sign_app() {
    echo "âœï¸ æ‰§è¡Œ ad-hoc ç­¾å..."
    clean_app_metadata
    if ! codesign --force --deep --options runtime --sign - "$FINAL_APP_PATH"; then
        echo "âŒ codesign å¤±è´¥"
        exit 1
    fi
    if ! codesign -vv "$FINAL_APP_PATH" >/dev/null 2>&1; then
        echo "âŒ ç­¾åæ ¡éªŒå¤±è´¥"
        exit 1
    fi
    if ! spctl --assess -vv --type execute "$FINAL_APP_PATH" >/dev/null 2>&1; then
        echo "â„¹ï¸ Gatekeeper ä»éœ€å³é”®â†’æ‰“å¼€æˆ–æ‰§è¡Œ 'sudo spctl --add \"$FINAL_APP_PATH\"' åå†è¿è¡Œï¼ˆæ­£å¸¸æç¤ºï¼‰"
    fi
    echo "âœ… ç­¾åä¸å±æ€§ä¿®å¤å®Œæˆ"
}

package_release() {
    mkdir -p "$RELEASE_DIR"
    local release_app="$RELEASE_DIR/${APP_PACKAGE_NAME}.app"
    local release_zip="$RELEASE_DIR/${APP_PACKAGE_NAME}.app.zip"

    rm -rf "$release_app" "$release_zip"
    cp -R "$FINAL_APP_PATH" "$release_app"
    (cd "$RELEASE_DIR" && ditto -c -k --keepParent "${APP_PACKAGE_NAME}.app" "${APP_PACKAGE_NAME}.app.zip")
    echo "âœ… äº§ç‰©å·²è¾“å‡ºè‡³: $release_app"
    echo "âœ… å‹ç¼©åŒ…: $release_zip"
}

create_dmg() {
    echo "ğŸ“¦ åˆ›å»º DMG..."
    mkdir -p "$DMG_DIR"
    rm -rf "$DMG_DIR"/*
    cp -R "$FINAL_APP_PATH" "$DMG_DIR/"
    ln -sf /Applications "$DMG_DIR/Applications"

    local dmg_path="$DIST_DIR/${APP_PACKAGE_NAME}.dmg"
    rm -f "$dmg_path"

    hdiutil create -volname "$APP_PACKAGE_NAME" \
        -srcfolder "$DMG_DIR" \
        -ov -format UDZO \
        "$dmg_path" >/dev/null

    echo "âœ… DMG åˆ›å»ºå®Œæˆ: $dmg_path"
}

main() {
    if $CLEAN_ONLY; then
        clean_build
        exit 0
    fi

    check_requirements
    install_dependencies

    # å›¾æ ‡å¤„ç†ï¼šæ­£å¼ç‰ˆç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨ç°æœ‰ icnsï¼Œä½“éªŒç‰ˆä» PNG ç”Ÿæˆ
    if [[ "$EDITION" == "official" ]]; then
        echo "âœ… ä½¿ç”¨ç°æœ‰é«˜æ¸…å›¾æ ‡: app_icon.icns (674K)"
        # æ— éœ€ç”Ÿæˆï¼ŒICON_TARGET å·²æŒ‡å‘ç°æœ‰æ–‡ä»¶
    elif [[ "$EDITION" == "trial" ]]; then
        generate_app_icon
    fi

    clean_build
    prepare_config
    prepare_platform_resources
    trap cleanup_on_exit EXIT

    build_app
    fix_app_permissions
    verify_app
    thin_binary
    embed_python_runtime
    sign_app
    package_release

    if $CREATE_DMG_FLAG; then
        create_dmg
    fi

    echo ""
    echo "ğŸ‰ ${EDITION_LABEL} æ‰“åŒ…å®Œæˆ"
    echo "   åº”ç”¨: $FINAL_APP_PATH"
    if $CREATE_DMG_FLAG; then
        echo "   DMG : $DIST_DIR/${APP_PACKAGE_NAME}.dmg"
    fi
    echo "ğŸ‘‰ æ³¨æ„ï¼šå½“å‰æ„å»ºä»…é’ˆå¯¹ Apple Silicon (arm64) è¿›è¡ŒéªŒè¯ã€‚"
}

main "$@"

# -*- mode: python ; coding: utf-8 -*-
"""
é¸½æ¢¦Godreamâ„¢ æ­£å¼ç‰ˆ PyInstaller é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ (macOS)
ç‰ˆæœ¬: v1.2.1 Official
æ‰“åŒ…å·¥å…·: PyInstaller 6.15.0+
Pythonç‰ˆæœ¬: 3.8-3.13 (Framework build)
"""

import os
from pathlib import Path

# é¡¹ç›®æ ¹ç›®å½•
project_root = Path(os.getcwd())

block_cipher = None

a = Analysis(
    ['qt_app.py'],
    pathex=[str(project_root)],
    binaries=[
        # macOS FFmpeg äºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ–‡ä»¶ï¼ˆarm64ï¼‰
        (str(project_root / 'edition' / 'resources' / 'bin' / 'ffmpeg'), 'edition/resources/bin/'),
        (str(project_root / 'edition' / 'resources' / 'bin' / 'ffprobe'), 'edition/resources/bin/'),
    ],
    datas=[
        # é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ï¼ˆä½¿ç”¨æ­£å¼ç‰ˆé…ç½®ï¼‰
        ('config_api_production.py', '.'),  # æ‰“åŒ…ä¸º config_api_production.py
        ('version.py', '.'),
        # ç‰ˆæœ¬æ§åˆ¶æ–‡ä»¶
        ('edition/__init__.py', 'edition/'),
        ('edition/constants.py', 'edition/'),
        ('edition/resources.py', 'edition/'),
        ('edition/watermark_service.py', 'edition/'),
        # å­—ä½“èµ„æº
        ('edition/resources/fonts/NotoSansSC-Regular.otf', 'edition/resources/fonts/'),
    ],
    hiddenimports=[
        # PyQt5æ ¸å¿ƒ
        'PyQt5.QtCore',
        'PyQt5.QtGui',
        'PyQt5.QtWidgets',
        'PyQt5.QtNetwork',
        # æ—¥å¿—å’Œè¯·æ±‚
        'loguru',
        'requests',
        'urllib3',
        'urllib3.util.retry',
        'urllib3.util.ssl_',
        'urllib3.contrib.pyopenssl',
        'certifi',
        # å›¾åƒå¤„ç†
        'PIL',
        'PIL.Image',
        'PIL.ImageDraw',
        'PIL.ImageFont',
        # æ•°æ®å¤„ç†
        'pandas',
        'numpy',
        # å¼‚æ­¥æ”¯æŒ
        'aiohttp',
        'asyncio',
        # ç¯å¢ƒé…ç½®
        'dotenv',
        'pathlib',
        # é¡¹ç›®æ¨¡å—
        'edition.constants',
        'edition.watermark_service',
        'edition.resources',
        'modules.config.config_manager',
        'modules.seedream.manager',
        'modules.seedream.client',
        'modules.seedance.manager',
        'modules.seedance.client',
        'modules.provider.factory',
        'modules.provider.volc',
        'modules.provider.volc_v4',
        'modules.repository.manager',
        'modules.repository.sqlite_handler',  # v1.2.x ä½¿ç”¨ SQLite
        'components.settings_page',
        'components.adapters.generation_adapter',
        'components.adapters.history_adapter',
        'utils.logger',
        'utils.storage_initializer',
        'utils.font_scaler',
        'modules.storage.unified_storage_manager_v2',
        'modules.storage.storage_manager_factory',
    ],
    hookspath=['packaging/macos/hooks'],  # ä½¿ç”¨è‡ªå®šä¹‰hook
    hooksconfig={},
    runtime_hooks=['packaging/macos/hooks/hook-config_api.py'],
    excludes=[
        # æ’é™¤ä¸éœ€è¦çš„å¤§å‹åº“
        'tkinter',
        'matplotlib',
        'scipy',
        'jupyter',
        'notebook',
        'IPython',
        'pytest',
        'setuptools',
        # Windowsä¸“ç”¨æ¨¡å—
        'win32com',
        'win32api',
        'pywin32',
    ],
    win_no_prefer_redirects=False,
    win_private_assemblies=False,
    cipher=block_cipher,
    noarchive=False,
)

pyz = PYZ(a.pure, a.zipped_data, cipher=block_cipher)

exe = EXE(
    pyz,
    a.scripts,
    [],
    exclude_binaries=True,
    name='é¸½æ¢¦Godream',
    debug=False,
    bootloader_ignore_signals=False,
    strip=False,

#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
"""
é¸½æ¢¦AI - macOSåº”ç”¨å¯åŠ¨å™¨
ä¸“ä¸ºæ‰“åŒ…åçš„åº”ç”¨è®¾è®¡ï¼Œå¤„ç†é¡¹ç›®ç‰¹æ®Šçš„å¯¼å…¥è·¯å¾„å’Œæ¶æ„çº¦æŸ
"""

import sys
import os
from pathlib import Path

# é¢„å…ˆåŠ è½½è¿è¡Œæ—¶èµ„æºï¼ˆå­—ä½“/ffmpegï¼‰
try:
    PACKAGING_ROOT = Path(__file__).resolve().parents[1]
    if str(PACKAGING_ROOT) not in sys.path:
        sys.path.insert(0, str(PACKAGING_ROOT))
    from packaging.macos.hooks.runtime_env import set_trial_runtime_env  # type: ignore
    set_trial_runtime_env()
except Exception:
    pass

def _ensure_import_paths():
    """
    ç¡®ä¿å¯¼å…¥è·¯å¾„è®¾ç½®æ­£ç¡®
    å¤„ç†gemeng_rootï¼ˆå¼€å‘ï¼‰+ parent_of_gemengï¼ˆéƒ¨ç½²ï¼‰åŒå¯¼å…¥ç­–ç•¥
    è¿™æ˜¯é¡¹ç›®çš„å¼ºåˆ¶è¦æ±‚
    """
    # è·å–å½“å‰è„šæœ¬æ‰€åœ¨ç›®å½•
    current_dir = Path(__file__).parent
    
    # åœ¨æ‰“åŒ…åº”ç”¨ä¸­ï¼Œéœ€è¦æ‰¾åˆ°Resourcesç›®å½•
    if hasattr(sys, '_MEIPASS'):
        # PyInstalleræ‰“åŒ…ç¯å¢ƒ
        project_root = Path(sys._MEIPASS)
    elif 'Contents/MacOS' in str(current_dir):
        # py2appæ‰“åŒ…ç¯å¢ƒ
        app_bundle = current_dir.parent.parent
        project_root = app_bundle / "Contents" / "Resources"
    else:
        # å¼€å‘ç¯å¢ƒ
        project_root = current_dir.parent.parent
    
    # gemeng_rootç­–ç•¥ï¼ˆå¼€å‘ç¯å¢ƒï¼‰
    gemeng_root = project_root
    if str(gemeng_root) not in sys.path:
        sys.path.insert(0, str(gemeng_root))
    
    # parent_of_gemengç­–ç•¥ï¼ˆéƒ¨ç½²ç¯å¢ƒï¼‰
    parent_of_gemeng = project_root.parent
    if str(parent_of_gemeng) not in sys.path:
        sys.path.insert(0, str(parent_of_gemeng))
    
    # ç¡®ä¿å…³é”®æ¨¡å—è·¯å¾„
    key_paths = [
        project_root / "components",
        project_root / "modules", 
        project_root / "utils",
        project_root / "config"
    ]
    
    for path in key_paths:
        if path.exists() and str(path) not in sys.path:
            sys.path.insert(0, str(path))
    
    # è®¾ç½®ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡
    os.environ["GEMENG_ROOT"] = str(gemeng_root)
    os.environ["GEMENG_PACKAGED"] = "1"

    # è®¾ç½® Qt æ’ä»¶è·¯å¾„ï¼ˆpy2app æ‰“åŒ…ç¯å¢ƒï¼‰
    if 'Contents/MacOS' in str(current_dir):
        qt_plugin_path = project_root / "lib" / "python3.13" / "PyQt5" / "Qt5" / "plugins"
        if qt_plugin_path.exists():
            os.environ["QT_PLUGIN_PATH"] = str(qt_plugin_path)

    return gemeng_root

def setup_logging():
    """
    è®¾ç½®æ—¥å¿—ç³»ç»Ÿï¼Œéµå¾ªé¡¹ç›®çš„æ—¥å¿—è„±æ•è§„èŒƒ
    """
    try:
        # å¯¼å…¥é¡¹ç›®çš„æ—¥å¿—å·¥å…·
        from utils.logger import setup_app_logger, get_logger
        
        # è·å–å­˜å‚¨ç›®å½•
        try:
            from config_api import get_storage_dir
            log_dir = Path(get_storage_dir()) / "logs"
        except ImportError:
            # å¦‚æœé…ç½®æ¨¡å—ä¸å¯ç”¨ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨é»˜è®¤ä½ç½®
            log_dir = Path.home() / "Library" / "Logs" / "gemeng-ai"
        
        # è®¾ç½®åº”ç”¨æ—¥å¿—
        setup_app_logger("é¸½æ¢¦AI", log_dir)
        logger = get_logger("AppLauncher")
        
        logger.info("macOSåº”ç”¨å¯åŠ¨å™¨åˆå§‹åŒ–å®Œæˆ")
        return logger
        
    except ImportError as e:
        # å¦‚æœæ—¥å¿—ç³»ç»Ÿä¸å¯ç”¨ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨åŸºæœ¬çš„printè¾“å‡º
        print(f"æ—¥å¿—ç³»ç»Ÿåˆå§‹åŒ–å¤±è´¥: {e}")
        return None

def check_environment():
    """
    æ£€æŸ¥è¿è¡Œç¯å¢ƒå’Œä¾èµ–
    """
    try:
        # æ£€æŸ¥PyQt5
        from PyQt5.QtWidgets import QApplication
        
        # æ£€æŸ¥å…³é”®æ¨¡å—
        import pandas
        import requests
        from PIL import Image
        
        return True
        
    except ImportError as e:
        error_msg = f"ç¼ºå°‘å¿…è¦ä¾èµ–: {e}"
        print(error_msg)
        
        # å°è¯•æ˜¾ç¤ºé”™è¯¯å¯¹è¯æ¡†
        try:
            from PyQt5.QtWidgets import QApplication, QMessageBox
            app = QApplication(sys.argv)
            
            msg = QMessageBox()
            msg.setIcon(QMessageBox.Critical)
            msg.setWindowTitle("é¸½æ¢¦Godreamâ„¢ - å¯åŠ¨é”™è¯¯")
            msg.setText("åº”ç”¨å¯åŠ¨å¤±è´¥")
            msg.setInformativeText(f"ç¼ºå°‘å¿…è¦çš„ä¾èµ–åº“ï¼š\n{e}\n\nè¯·è”ç³»æŠ€æœ¯æ”¯æŒæˆ–é‡æ–°å®‰è£…åº”ç”¨ã€‚")
            msg.exec_()
            
        except:
            pass
        
        return False

def launch_main_app():
    """
    å¯åŠ¨ä¸»åº”ç”¨ç¨‹åº
    """
    try:
        # å¯¼å…¥ä¸»åº”ç”¨
        from qt_app import main
        
        # å¯åŠ¨åº”ç”¨
        return main()
        
    except ImportError as e:
        error_msg = f"æ— æ³•å¯¼å…¥ä¸»åº”ç”¨æ¨¡å—: {e}"
        print(error_msg)
        
        # å°è¯•æ˜¾ç¤ºé”™è¯¯å¯¹è¯æ¡†
        try:
            from PyQt5.QtWidgets import QApplication, QMessageBox
            app = QApplication(sys.argv)
            
            msg = QMessageBox()
            msg.setIcon(QMessageBox.Critical)
            msg.setWindowTitle("é¸½æ¢¦Godreamâ„¢ - å¯åŠ¨é”™è¯¯")
            msg.setText("åº”ç”¨å¯åŠ¨å¤±è´¥")
            msg.setInformativeText(f"æ— æ³•åŠ è½½ä¸»åº”ç”¨ç¨‹åºï¼š\n{e}\n\nè¯·æ£€æŸ¥åº”ç”¨å®‰è£…æ˜¯å¦å®Œæ•´ã€‚")
            msg.exec_()
            
        except:
            pass
        
        return 1
        
    except Exception as e:
        error_msg = f"åº”ç”¨è¿è¡Œæ—¶é”™è¯¯: {e}"
        print(error_msg)
        
        # è®°å½•åˆ°æ—¥å¿—
        try:
            logger = setup_logging()
            if logger:
                logger.error(error_msg)
        except:
            pass
        
        return 1

def main():
    """
    ä¸»å‡½æ•° - macOSåº”ç”¨å¯åŠ¨å…¥å£ç‚¹
    """
    print("ğŸ•Šï¸ é¸½æ¢¦AI - macOSåº”ç”¨å¯åŠ¨å™¨")
    print("=" * 40)
    
    try:
        # 1. è®¾ç½®å¯¼å…¥è·¯å¾„ï¼ˆé¡¹ç›®å¼ºåˆ¶è¦æ±‚ï¼‰
        project_root = _ensure_import_paths()
        print(f"é¡¹ç›®æ ¹ç›®å½•: {project_root}")
        
        # 2. è®¾ç½®æ—¥å¿—ç³»ç»Ÿ
        logger = setup_logging()
        if logger:
            logger.info("å¯åŠ¨å™¨å¼€å§‹è¿è¡Œ")
        
        # 3. æ£€æŸ¥ç¯å¢ƒä¾èµ–
        print("æ£€æŸ¥è¿è¡Œç¯å¢ƒ...")
        if not check_environment():
            print("âŒ ç¯å¢ƒæ£€æŸ¥å¤±è´¥")
            return 1
        
        print("âœ… ç¯å¢ƒæ£€æŸ¥é€šè¿‡")
        
        # 4. å¯åŠ¨ä¸»åº”ç”¨
        print("å¯åŠ¨ä¸»åº”ç”¨ç¨‹åº...")
        if logger:
            logger.info("å¯åŠ¨ä¸»åº”ç”¨ç¨‹åº")
        
        exit_code = launch_main_app()
        
        if logger:
            logger.info(f"åº”ç”¨é€€å‡ºï¼Œé€€å‡ºç : {exit_code}")
        
        return exit_code
        
    except KeyboardInterrupt:
        print("\nğŸ‘‹ ç”¨æˆ·ä¸­æ–­å¯åŠ¨")
        return 0
        
    except Exception as e:
        error_msg = f"å¯åŠ¨å™¨å¼‚å¸¸: {e}"
        print(f"âŒ {error_msg}")
        
        # å°è¯•è®°å½•é”™è¯¯
        try:
            if 'logger' in locals() and logger:
                logger.error(error_msg)
        except:

        return 1

if __name__ == "__main__":
    # è®¾ç½®macOSç‰¹å®šçš„ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡
    os.environ["QT_MAC_WANTS_LAYER"] = "1"

    # è¿è¡Œå¯åŠ¨å™¨
    sys.exit(main())

#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
"""
é¸½æ¢¦AI - macOSåº”ç”¨æ‰“åŒ…é…ç½®
ä½¿ç”¨py2appå°†Pythonåº”ç”¨æ‰“åŒ…ä¸ºmacOS .appåº”ç”¨
"""

from setuptools import setup
import plistlib
import os
import sys
import importlib.util
from pathlib import Path

# ç¡®ä¿å¯¼å…¥è·¯å¾„
project_root = Path(__file__).parent.parent.parent
sys.path.insert(0, str(project_root))

# åº”ç”¨ä¿¡æ¯
default_version = "0.8.0"
version_file = project_root / "version.py"
if version_file.exists():
    try:
        spec = importlib.util.spec_from_file_location("gemeng_version", version_file)
        version_module = importlib.util.module_from_spec(spec)
        spec.loader.exec_module(version_module)  # type: ignore[attr-defined]
        default_version = getattr(version_module, "__version__", default_version)
    except Exception:
        pass

APP_NAME = os.environ.get("GEMENG_APP_NAME", "é¸½æ¢¦Godream")
APP_VERSION = os.environ.get("GEMENG_APP_VERSION", default_version)
APP_BUNDLE_ID = os.environ.get("GEMENG_APP_BUNDLE_ID", "com.gemeng.ai")
APP_MAIN_SCRIPT = str(Path(__file__).parent / "app_launcher.py")

# åˆ›å»ºInfo.plistå†…å®¹
INFO_PLIST = {
    'CFBundleName': APP_NAME,
    'CFBundleDisplayName': APP_NAME,
    'CFBundleIdentifier': APP_BUNDLE_ID,
    'CFBundleVersion': APP_VERSION,
    'CFBundleShortVersionString': APP_VERSION,
    'CFBundleExecutable': APP_NAME,
    'CFBundleIconFile': 'app_icon',
    'NSHighResolutionCapable': True,
    'LSMinimumSystemVersion': '10.14.0',
    'NSAppTransportSecurity': {
        'NSAllowsArbitraryLoads': True
    },
    'NSCameraUsageDescription': 'åº”ç”¨éœ€è¦è®¿é—®ç›¸æœºä»¥ç”Ÿæˆå›¾ç‰‡',
    'NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription': 'åº”ç”¨éœ€è¦è®¿é—®ç…§ç‰‡åº“ä»¥ä¿å­˜ç”Ÿæˆçš„å›¾ç‰‡å’Œè§†é¢‘',
    'CFBundleDocumentTypes': [
        {
            'CFBundleTypeIconFile': 'app_icon',
            'CFBundleTypeName': 'Image Files',
            'CFBundleTypeRole': 'Viewer',
            'LSItemContentTypes': ['public.image'],
            'LSHandlerRank': 'Alternate'
        },
        {
            'CFBundleTypeIconFile': 'app_icon', 
            'CFBundleTypeName': 'Video Files',
            'CFBundleTypeRole': 'Viewer',
            'LSItemContentTypes': ['public.movie'],
            'LSHandlerRank': 'Alternate'
        }
    ]
}

# éœ€è¦åŒ…å«çš„æ•°æ®æ–‡ä»¶å’Œèµ„æº
RESOURCE_FILE_NAMES = [
    "config_api_example.py",
    ".env.example",
    "README.md",
    "LICENSE",
]

RESOURCE_FILES = [
    str(project_root / file_name)
    for file_name in RESOURCE_FILE_NAMES
    if (project_root / file_name).exists()
]

DATA_FILES = [("", RESOURCE_FILES)] if RESOURCE_FILES else []

# éœ€è¦åŒ…å«çš„åŒ…
PACKAGES = [
    'components',
    'config', 
    'modules',
    'utils',
    'docs',
    'scripts',
    'edition',
]

# éœ€è¦æ’é™¤çš„åŒ…ï¼ˆå‡å°‘ä½“ç§¯ï¼‰
EXCLUDES = [
    'matplotlib',
    'numpy.distutils',
    'numpy.tests',
    'setuptools',
    'distutils',
    'pkg_resources',
    'pip',
    'wheel',
    'pytest',
    'black',
    'flake8',
    'PyInstaller',
    'tkinter',
]

# éœ€è¦åŒ…å«çš„æ¨¡å—
INCLUDES = [
    'PyQt5.QtCore',
    'PyQt5.QtGui', 
    'PyQt5.QtWidgets',
    'PyQt5.QtNetwork',
    'requests',
    'cmath',
    'loguru',
    'pandas',
    'PIL',
    'json',
    'csv',
    'pathlib',
    'asyncio',
    'aiohttp'
]

icon_override = os.environ.get("GEMENG_APP_ICON")
default_icon_path = Path(__file__).parent / "app_icon.icns"
ICON_PATH = Path(icon_override) if icon_override else default_icon_path

# py2appé€‰é¡¹
OPTIONS = {
    'py2app': {
        'dist_dir': str(project_root / "dist"),
        'bdist_base': str(project_root / "build"),
        'optimize': 2,
        'compressed': True,
        'semi_standalone': False,
        'site_packages': True,
        'strip': False,
        'iconfile': str(ICON_PATH),
        'plist': INFO_PLIST,
        'packages': PACKAGES,
        'includes': INCLUDES,
        'excludes': EXCLUDES,
        'resources': [
            str(project_root / "components"),
            str(project_root / "modules"), 
            str(project_root / "utils"),
            str(project_root / "config"),
            str(project_root / "edition" / "resources"),
        ],
        'qt_plugins': [
            'platforms',
            'styles',
            'imageformats',
            'iconengines',
            'platforminputcontexts',
            'printsupport',
        ],
        'argv_emulation': False,
        'use_pythonpath': True,
        'alias': False,
        'debug_modulegraph': False,
        'debug_skip_macholib': False,
        'matplotlib_backends': [],
    }
}

setup(
    name=APP_NAME,
